post_description: Bootstrap is used for creating responsive web and mobile applications whereas Tailwind CSS is used to create customized user interfaces
to add interactivity and features to improve the user experience and make the internet much more enjoyable.

post_name: How to add icons with animations to your page?
post_description: One really unique website is fontawesome. They have a variety of icons you can choose and style as well as diffrent animations you can make them do.
